stations.name: Metro Center
stations.description: Metro Center is the central hub of the Metrorail system, located at the intersection of G Street and 12th/13th Streets NW. It is one of the busiest stations in the system and serves as a transfer point between the Red, Blue, Orange, and Silver lines.

entrances.name: 11TH ST NW & G ST NW
entrances.description: Building Entrance from the southeast corner of 11th St NW and G St NW.

entrances.name: 13TH ST NW & G ST NW
entrances.description: Building Entrance from the southeast corner of 13th St NW and G St NW.

entrances.name: ENTRANCE FROM MACY'S
entrances.description: Building entrance from west mezzanine to Macy's entrance.

entrances.name: GRANT HYATT HOTEL
entrances.description: Building entrance from east mezzanine to Grand Hyatt Hotel entrance.

entrances.name: 12TH ST NW & G ST NW
entrances.description: Street level elevator at 12th St NW segment between G St NW and H St NW.

entrances.name: 12TH ST NW & F ST NW
entrances.description: Escalator to station from the building located at the southeast corner of 12th St NW and F St NW.

entrances.name: 12TH ST NW & G ST NW
entrances.description: Escalator to station from northeast corner of 12th St NW and G St NW.

entrances.name: ENTRANCE FROM MACY'S
entrances.description: Building entrance from north mezzanine to Macy's entrance.

stations.name: Gallery Place-Chinatown
stations.description: Gallery Place-Chinatown serves the Penn Quarter and Chinatown neighborhoods. The station is adjacent to Capital One Arena and the National Portrait Gallery.

entrances.name: 9TH ST NW & G ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance located at the southeast corner of 9th St NW and G St NW.

entrances.name: 7TH ST NW & F ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance from Verizon center, located at the northeast corner of F St NW and 7th St NW.

entrances.name: 7TH ST NW & F ST NW
entrances.description: Elevator from Verizon Center, located at east of 7th St NW.

entrances.name: 7TH ST NW & H ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance from the southeast corner of 7th St NW and H St NW.

stations.name: Union Station
stations.description: Union Station serves the historic Union Station, providing connections to Amtrak, MARC, and VRE commuter rail services, as well as intercity bus services.

entrances.name: 1ST ST NE & G ST NE
entrances.description: Elevator entrance from the passageway to AMTRAK, MARC, VRE TRAINS

entrances.name: 1ST ST NE & G ST NE
entrances.description: Escalator entrance from the passageway to AMTRAK, MARC, VRE TRAINS

entrances.name: 1ST ST NE & MASSACHUSETTS AVE NE
entrances.description: Station entrance from 1st St NE to southeast corner of the Union station building.

entrances.name: 1ST ST NE & G ST NE
entrances.description: Station entrance from northeast corner of Massachusetts Ave NE and 1st NE.

stations.name: Pentagon
stations.description: Pentagon station serves the United States Department of Defense headquarters. It is one of the deepest stations in the system at 97 feet below ground.

entrances.name: S EADS ST
entrances.description: Steet level elevator to station is accessible from bus bay area sidewalks.

entrances.name: S EADS ST &
entrances.description: Station entrance at the north side of bus bay accessible from the bus bay area sidewalks.

entrances.name: S EADS ST & N ROTARY RD
entrances.description: Station entrance at the south side of bus bay accessible from the bus bay area sidewalks.

stations.name: Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport
stations.description: This station provides direct access to Reagan National Airport, serving as a major transportation hub for air travelers to the Washington area.

entrances.name: S SMITH BLVD
entrances.description: Street level elevator to station platform

entrances.name: S SMITH BLVD
entrances.description: Pedestrian bridge to station north entrance is accessible from parking garage - C and airport terminal -C

entrances.name: S SMITH BLVD
entrances.description: Pedestrian bridge to station south entrance is accessible from parking garage-B and airport terminal-B

stations.name: Washington Dulles International Airport
stations.description: The newest major station on the Silver Line, providing direct rail access to Dulles International Airport for the first time.

stations.name: Farragut North
stations.description: Located in the central business district, Farragut North is one of the original five stations that opened with the system in 1976.

entrances.name: CONNECTICUT AVE NW & K ST NW
entrances.description: Elevator entrance from Connecticut Ave NW

entrances.name: CONNECTICUT AVE NW & K ST NW
entrances.description: Building entrance from the northeast corner of Connecticut Ave NW and K St NW.

entrances.name: CONNECTICUT AVE NW & L ST NW
entrances.description: Building entrance from the northeast corner of L St NW and Connecticut Ave NW. (Escalator Only)

entrances.name: CONNECTICUT AVE NW & L ST NW
entrances.description: Building entrance from the southwest corner of L St NW and Connecticut Ave NW. (Escalator Only)

stations.name: Farragut West
stations.description: Farragut West serves the western portion of downtown D.C. and is located near the White House and World Bank headquarters.

entrances.name: 18TH ST NW & I ST NW
entrances.description: Entrance elevator is located at the northwest corner of 18th St NW and I St NW.

entrances.name: 17TH ST NW & I ST NW
entrances.description: Building entrance from the southeast corner of 17th St NW and I St NW(Escalator only).

entrances.name: 18TH ST NW & I ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance escalator is located in the building courtyard, at the northwest corner of 18 St NW and I St NW.

entrances.name: 18TH ST NW & I ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance escalator is located in the building (International Square) food court

stations.name: Shady Grove
stations.description: Shady Grove is the northwestern terminus of the Red Line, located in Montgomery County, Maryland with extensive parking facilities.

entrances.name: SOMERVILLE DR & REDLAND RD
entrances.description: Street level elevator to station is located next to west side escalator and is accessible from bus bay and parking lot.

entrances.name: SOMERVILLE DR & REDLAND RD
entrances.description: West side station entrance from bus bay and parking lot is located east of Somerville Dr.

entrances.name: CRABBS BRANCH WAY & REDLAND RD
entrances.description: Passageway from east side of the station accessible from bus bay and parking garage located northwest corner of Crabbs Branch Way and Redland Rd.

stations.name: Glenmont
stations.description: Glenmont is the northeastern terminus of the Red Line and was the final Red Line station to open.

entrances.name: GEORGIA AVE & GLENALLAN AVE
entrances.description: Street level elevator from east of Georgia Ave, and is accessible from Glenallan Ave to the metered parking space and parking garage.

entrances.name: GEORGIA AVE & URBANA DR
entrances.description: Street level elevator from west from Georgia Ave next to metered parking area.

entrances.name: GEORGIA AVE & GLENALLAN AVE
entrances.description: Station entrance from east side of Georgia Ave, and is accessible from parking garage and bus bay area.

entrances.name: GEORGIA AVE & URBANA DR
entrances.description: Station entrance from west of Georgia Ave and is accessible from Georgia Ave sidewalks and from Urbana Dr and Flack St walkway to the station.

stations.name: L'Enfant Plaza
stations.description: L'Enfant Plaza is one of the most important transfer stations in the system, serving all lines except the Red Line. It is adjacent to the Smithsonian museums.

entrances.name: 7TH ST SW & D ST SW
entrances.description: Building entrance(USDOT) from D St SW segment between 6th St SW and 7th St SW.

entrances.name: 9TH ST SW & D ST SW
entrances.description: Building entrance(L'Enfant Plaza) from D St SW segment between 9th St SW and 7th St SW.

entrances.name: C ST SW & MARYLAND AVE
entrances.description: Street level elevator located on 7th St SW segment between VRE tracks and C St SW/Maryland Ave SW intersection.

entrances.name: 7TH ST SW & MARYLAND AVE SW
entrances.description: Canopied entrance located at Maryland Ave SW and the east of 7th St SW.

stations.name: Rosslyn
stations.description: Rosslyn is the deepest station in the system at 97 feet below ground and serves as the gateway between D.C. and Northern Virginia.

entrances.name: N MOORE ST & WILSON BLVD
entrances.description: Street level high-speed elevator entrance, accessible from N. Lynn St and N.Moore St sidewalks.

entrances.name: N MOORE ST & WILSON BLVD
entrances.description: Station main entrance is accessible from bus bay area located on N.Moore St segment between 19th St.N and Wilson Blvd.

entrances.name: FORT MYER DR & WILSON BLVD
entrances.description: Building entrance from N. Fort Myer Dr segment between N. Nash St and Wilson Blvd is accessible by N. Fort Myer Dr sidewalks.

stations.name: Bethesda
stations.description: Bethesda station serves the downtown Bethesda business district in Montgomery County, Maryland.

entrances.name: WISCONSIN AVE & MONTGOMERY LN
entrances.description: Elevator entrance from northwest corner of Wisconsin Ave and Montgomery Ln.

entrances.name: EDGEMOOR LN
entrances.description: Entrance from bus bay (intermediate level)

entrances.name: WISCONSIN AVE & EAST WEST HWY UNDERPASS
entrances.description: Building entrance to tunnel to station located at southeast corner of Wisconsin Ave and East-West Hwy.

entrances.name: WISCONSIN AVE & OLD GEORGETOWN RD
entrances.description: Escalator entrance from southwest corner of Wisconsin Ave and Old Georgetown Rd.

stations.name: Silver Spring
stations.description: Silver Spring is a major transit hub providing connections to MARC commuter rail and numerous bus routes.

entrances.name: 2ND AVE & COLESVILLE RD
entrances.description: Station entrance from north of Colesville Road and west of 2nd Ave to station northeast side.

entrances.name: COLESVILLE RD & E-WEST HWY
entrances.description: Station entrance from north of Colesville Road and east of East-West Hwy to station northwest side.

entrances.name: COLESVILLE RD & E-WEST HWY
entrances.description: Station entrance from south of Colesville Road and east of East-West Hwy to station southwest side.

entrances.name: WAYNE AVE & COLESVILLE RD
entrances.description: Walkway from Wayne Ave and Colesville Rd to south side of the station.

stations.name: Tysons Corner
stations.description: Tysons Corner station serves the major commercial center and shopping destination in Fairfax County, Virginia.

entrances.name: TYSONGS BLVD & CHAIN BRIDGE RD
entrances.description: Elevator to the station accessible from the bus bay and sidewalk located at the northwest corner of Tysons Blvd and Chain Bridge Rd intersection.

entrances.name: TYSONS ONE PL & TYSONS BLVD
entrances.description: South pavilion elevator entrance from Fairfax Connector bus bay.

entrances.name: TYSONGS BLVD & CHAIN BRIDGE RD
entrances.description: Station entrance from the bus bay and sidewalk located at the northwest corner of Tysons Blvd and Chain Bridge Rd intersection.

entrances.name: TYSONS ONE PL & TYSONS BLVD
entrances.description: South pavilion entrance from station sideswalk and Fairfax Connector bus bay.

entrances.name: TYSONS MALL
entrances.description: Non WMATA maintained entrance from the Tysons mall Pedestrian bridge

stations.name: Ashburn
stations.description: Ashburn is the western terminus of the Silver Line, serving Loudoun County's rapidly growing data center corridor.

entrances.name: 43625 CROSON LN
entrances.description: South pavilion elevator entrance from south bus bay.

entrances.name: 43655 ASHBURN METRO DRIVE
entrances.description: North pavilion elevator entrance from north bus bay.

entrances.name: 43625 CROSON LN
entrances.description: South pavilion entrance from south bus bay.

entrances.name: 43655 ASHBURN METRO DRIVE
entrances.description: North pavilion entrance from north bus bay.

stations.name: Navy Yard-Ballpark
stations.description: Navy Yard-Ballpark serves the Capitol Riverfront neighborhood and Nationals Park, home of the Washington Nationals.

entrances.name: M ST SE & NEW JERSEY AVE SE
entrances.description: Street level elevator to station is located at M St SE segment between 1st St SE and New Jersey Ave SE.

entrances.name: M ST SE & NEW JERSEY AVE SE
entrances.description: Canopied entrance from the northwest corner of New Jersey Ave SE and M St SE.

entrances.name: M ST SE & HALF ST SE
entrances.description: Building entrance from the southeast corner Half St SE and M St SE to access station escalator.

stations.name: U Street/African-Amer Civil War Memorial/Cardozo
stations.description: U Street serves the historic U Street Corridor, known for its jazz heritage and nightlife, and is near the African American Civil War Memorial.

entrances.name: 13TH ST NW & U ST NW
entrances.description: Street level elevator from the building located at U St NW segment between 12th St NW and 13th St NW.

entrances.name: 13TH ST NW & U ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance from southeast corner of 13th Ave NW and U St NW.

entrances.name: VERMONT AVE NW & U ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance from the south of 10th St and southwest corner of U St NW and Vermont Ave NW.

stations.name: Columbia Heights
stations.description: Columbia Heights station serves the Columbia Heights neighborhood and the DC USA shopping center.

entrances.name: 14TH ST NW & IRVING ST NW
entrances.description: Elevator entrance from southwest corner of 14th St NW and Irving St NW.

entrances.name: 14TH ST NW & IRVING ST NW
entrances.description: Canopied escalator entrance from northeast corner of 14th St NW and Irving St NW.

entrances.name: 14TH ST NW & IRVING ST NW
entrances.description: Canopied escalator and stairway entrance from southwest corner of 14th St NW and Irving St NW.

stations.name: Vienna/Fairfax-GMU
stations.description: Vienna is the western terminus of the Orange Line, serving Fairfax County and George Mason University.

entrances.name: SAINTSBURY DR & ROYAL VICTORIA DR
entrances.description: Pedestrian bridge to station from south side accessible by the sidewalks from south side parking lot, parking garage, bus bay and kiss&ride located on Saintsbury Dr.

entrances.name: VIRGINIA CENTER BLVD & CENTERBORO DR
entrances.description: Pedestrian bridge to station from north side accessible by the sidewalks from north side parking lot, parking garage, bus bay and kiss&ride located off Virginia Center Blvd.

stations.name: Dupont Circle
stations.description: Dupont Circle serves the vibrant Dupont Circle neighborhood, known for its embassies, restaurants, and LGBTQ+ community.

entrances.name: Q ST NW & CONNECTICUT AVE NW
entrances.description: Street level elevator at north side of the station is accessible from Connecticut Ave NW, 20th NW and Q St NW.

entrances.description: Canopied entrance from 19th St NW and is also accessible from Connecticut Ave NW.

entrances.name: Q ST NW & 20TH ST NW
entrances.description: North side station entrance is located at the southeast corner of 20th NW and Q St NW and accessible from Connecticut Ave NW.

stations.name: Woodley Park-Zoo/Adams Morgan
stations.description: Serves the Woodley Park neighborhood and provides access to the Smithsonian National Zoo.

entrances.description: Street level elevator from the southwest corner of Woodley Rd NW and Connecticut Ave NW.

entrances.name: CONNECTICUT AVE NW & 24TH ST NW
entrances.description: Station entrance from southwest corner of Connecticut Ave NW and 24th St NW.

stations.name: Cleveland Park
stations.description: Cleveland Park station serves a residential neighborhood with historic homes and local shops.

entrances.description: Elevator entrance from northeast corner of Connecticut Ave NW and Ordway St NW.

entrances.description: Canopied escalator and stairway entrance on west side of Connecticut Ave NW, between Ordway St NW and Porter St NW.

stations.name: Van Ness-UDC
stations.description: Serves the Van Ness neighborhood and the University of the District of Columbia.

stations.name: Tenleytown-AU
stations.description: Serves American University and the Tenleytown commercial district.

entrances.name: WISCONSIN AVE NW & ALBEMARLE ST NW

entrances.description: Building entrance from west side of Wisconsin Ave segment between River Rd NW and Albemarle St NW( Next to Best Buy).

stations.name: Friendship Heights
stations.description: Located on the D.C./Maryland border, serving a major retail district.

entrances.description: Elevator entrance to station from southwest corner of Jenifer St NW and Wisconsin Ave NW.

entrances.description: Elevator entrance to station from east side of Wisconsin Ave NW.

entrances.description: Station entrance from Wisconsin Place parking garage.

entrances.description: Canopied entrance from the northwest corner of Western Ave and Wisconsin Ave NW.

entrances.name: WISCONSIN AVE NW & WESTERN AVE NW

entrances.name: MAZZA GALLERIE BUILDING ENTRANCE
entrances.description: Entrance from Mazza Galleries (not WMATA)

stations.name: Medical Center
stations.description: Serves the National Institutes of Health and Walter Reed National Military Medical Center.

entrances.description: Street level elevator is accessible by the sidewalks from Bethesda Trolley Trial and from bus bay area.

entrances.description: Street level elevator is accessible by the sidewalks from Bethesda Trolley Trial and from walter reed medical center

entrances.description: Canopied entrance from the south side of bus bay area located southwest corner of Bethesda Trolley Trial and South Dr.

stations.name: Grosvenor-Strathmore
stations.description: Serves the Strathmore music center and surrounding residential areas.

entrances.description: Passageway from east of Grosvenor Pl goes under Rockville pike to the escalator to the station.

stations.description: Serves the Twinbrook neighborhood and nearby commercial areas in Rockville.

stations.name: Rockville
stations.description: Serves downtown Rockville with connections to MARC Brunswick Line commuter rail.

entrances.name: PARK RD & ROCKVILLE PIKE
entrances.description: Station west side entrance is accessible from bus bay, metered parking located southeast of Park Rd/ Rockville Pike.

entrances.description: Station west side entrance is accessible from the pedestrian bridge originates from the Montgomery County Office buildings and Monroe Street

stations.name: Wheaton
stations.description: Features one of the longest single-span escalators in the Western Hemisphere at 230 feet.

entrances.name: GEORGIA AVE & REEDIE DR
entrances.description: Station entrance from the building located at the southeast corner of Georgia Ave and Reedie Dr.

stations.name: Forest Glen
stations.description: The deepest station in the system at 196 feet below ground, with no escalatorsonly elevators.

entrances.description: Stairway entrance into main entrance passageway from southeast corner of Coleridge Dr/Forest Glen Rd.

entrances.name: ELKTON AVE & FOREST GLEN RD
entrances.description: Entrance by ramp from southeast corner of bus bay, kiss&ride area, and parking lot located at Kimball Pl/Forest Glen Rd(passageway goes under Forest Glen Rd to the station).

stations.name: Takoma
stations.description: Serves the Takoma neighborhood near the D.C./Maryland border.

entrances.description: Elevator to station is located inside the tunnel and is accessible from parking lot and bus bay.

stations.description: Serves Catholic University of America and the Brookland neighborhood.

entrances.description: Station entrance is accessible from bus bay,parking lot and kiss&ride area located south of Rhode Island Ave NE and Reed St NE.
